glsa.title: Libnids: remote code execution vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: Libnids contains a bug which could allow remote code execution.

background.p: Libnids is a component of a network intrusion detection system.

description.p: There is a bug in the part of libnids code responsible for TCP reassembly. The flaw probably allows remote code execution.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: It is recommended that all Gentoo Linux users who are running net-libs/libnids update their systems as follows:
resolution.code: # emerge sync # emerge -pv '>=net-libs/libnids-1.18' # emerge '>=net-libs/libnids-1.18' # emerge clean
